svg.text: One Bus, Six Scenes - Complete Event Routing Story

g.text: Every journey starts with a publish.
The depot launches the event onto the route.
The manifest maps the path, while debounce slows bursts at the light.
Live and late subscribers both get the message, thanks to the Replay Cache.
At the hub, events branch into sequences and plugins.
Guardrails, flags, throttle, and debounce enforce stability.
Events arrive at the school — the application state is updated.
